page.title: 08Four Oaks Media.
page.content: Television is much more important to our families than radio. Every family in our school has a television, more than half have two, about a quarter have one, and a quarter have more than two.Most people watch daily for between 3 and 5 hours.Many watch for over 5 hours. We do not think they would have time for many other interests. Only a few families who must choose programmes carefully wach less than 2 hours.Adults and children watch about the same amount. Children watch earlier but adults stay up later.About three quarters of our families have a video recorder and nearly half have a home computer. The children like to play games like "Space Invaders",so do their parents! Reading is enjoyed by all the ages and many people visit the library frequently.
